page.title: 08GAMES AND LEISURE,BRIDGEND
page.content: The survey showed that during school play periods activities differ between boys and girls,infants and juniors. These activities range from skipping to chasing games,playing with model cars to football.Now and then a trend appears in which the majority of children will participate,e.g.conkers, marbles,hopscotch. After school a lot of children enjoy riding their bicycles.Many girls have roller skates while the boys play football or,in the summer,cricket. Everyone said they watch some television every day.Many families have a video recorder. Many children are involved with clubs or organisations like gym,dance,cubs, guides etc. The most popular leisure activity among parents is watching television.
